Hadziloukas finally a spy?
03 Nov 2019, 11:21 by Sigmalive / sports
Apparently Lucas Chatziloukas is reportedly ready to take over APOEL, a different post than he originally intended. According to the latest information, the administration of the "blue eyes" will assign the former Doxa coach a scout role with responsibilities for monitoring the team's opponents as well as potential transfer targets. The Apollo administration had intended to hire Hadjilukas to take over as the team's coaching staff, but Thomas Dol's position, which did not want changes to the existing team, did not change in the days that followed. Thus, it remains to be seen whether the latest information is officially confirmed by the champions' announcements.
